history.proof: intros p m H. destruct (pl_non_empty_path_true_rev p m H) as [plp [Hincl Htrue]]. exists plp. split; trivial.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists pl : pl_path, pl_path_true pl m /\ pl_path_incl pl p

Premises:
Inductive pl_path_true : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop := plp_true_nil : forall m : Map bool, pl_path_true pl_path_nil m | plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
pl_non_empty = fix pl_non_empty (m : Map bool) (p : prec_list) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => pl_non_empty m ls || b && pl_non_empty m la | None => pl_non_empty m ls end | prec_cons a la prec_empty => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => b && pl_non_empty m la | None => false end | prec_empty => true end : Map bool -> prec_list -> bool
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_non_empty_path_true : forall (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 = fun (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) => forall m : Map bool, pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_true_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop, (forall m : Map bool, P pl_path_nil m) -> (forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> P pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> P (pl_path_cons a pl) m) -> forall (p : pl_path) (m : Map bool), pl_path_true p m -> P p m
dt_non_empty_r_1 : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool), st_non_empty m s = true -> exists (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ pl_non_empty m p = true
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
st_non_empty_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (s : state) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> pl_non_empty m p = true -> st_non_empty m s = true
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
liste_rec_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA) (n : nat), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl
signature.pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
st_non_empty = fix st_non_empty (m : Map bool) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => false | @M1 _ _ p => pl_non_empty m p | @M2 _ a b => st_non_empty m a || st_non_empty m b end : Map bool -> state -> bool
liste_rec_length_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, liste_reconnait d pl tl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
invar_list = fun tl : term_list => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tl n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tl m = true : term_list -> Prop
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> signature.pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop

```coq
intros p m H.
destruct (pl_non_empty_path_true_rev p m H) as [plp [Hincl Htrue]].
exists plp.
split; trivial.
Qed.
